name: Live Your Legend Badge
author: Chris Forte

sections.description:
Display a Live Your Legend badge in the sidebar of your blog.

There is the option to link to liveyourlegend.net.

The widget allows you to select a title, the badge you want to display (more coming soon) and whether you wish to link to livingyourlegend.net

Badge Credits

magicinfluence
sections.installation: Upload the Live Your Legend Badge plugin to your blog, activate it, then add the widget (Live Your Legend Badge) on the widgets page. Configure the widget with a title, badge and link option.
sections.faq:
Q: I would like to design a new badge for inclusion into the plugin. How do I get it added?

A: Email hello@tutticommunications with the subject ‘New badge for Live Your Legend plugin’ and attach your badge. I will review the badge for possible inclusion in the next update of the plugin. I will credit you for your badge if I include it in the section below in the readme file of subsequent updates.
